meta.title: San José Unified Resources and Information During School Closures | COVID-19 Updates | District Information | Who We Are | San José Unified School District

br.a: What is going on at San José Unified?

div.h1: San José Unified Resources and Information During School Closures

div.p: All San José Unified locations are closed to the public through May 3, 2020 in accordance with the current Order of the Health Officer of the County of Santa Clara

Call 408-535-6000 to leave a message with our team
